pages.title: Crafting
pages.text: Floppy Disks can be written to using a Disk Writer block.$(br2)The Disk Writer can write on up to 64 Floppy Disks at one time.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: To use the Disk Writer insert up to 64 blank Floppy Disks in the disk slot. Once you have disks loaded fill out the fields:$(br2)1. Disk Title: The title of the disk (up to 64 characters).$(br2)2. Disk URL: The MIDI URL for the disk (up to 256 characters).$(br2)Click 'Write' to write the data to the disks.

pages.title: MIDI URL
pages.text: The MIDI URL should be a web URL (Ex: $(o)https://test.com/test.mid)$() pointing directly to a MIDI file.$(br2)MIMI will try to validate the URL and if the text box is red it means the URL is invalid.$(br2)The MIDI URL may also point to a MIDI file in the server's default music folder, if any exist. These URLs should use the format $(o)server://<file_name>$() (Ex: $(o)server://test.mid$())$(br2)
